|| [BrainRegionHBA_FD_MB_MMB HBA.FD.MB.MMB] || Medial Mammillary Nucleus || nucleus || FMU || Relay for impulses coming from AM and HC || Memory, recognition, spatial awareness, and<BR>interpreting the context of events ||
